lowerCourt: United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit

wikiData.title: Harris v. Viegelahn
wikiData.FullName: Charles E. Harris, III, Petitioner v. Mary K. Viegelahn, Chapter 13 Trustee
wikiData.Prior: ''In re Harris'', [https://www.leagle.com/decision/infdco20130326744 491 B.R. 866] ([[W.D. Tex.]] 2013); reversed, 757 [[F.3d]] [https://www.leagle.com/decision/infco20140707087 468] ([[5th Cir.]] 2014); [[Certiorari|cert]]. granted, 135 S. Ct. 782 (2014).
wikiData.Holding: A debtor who converts to Chapter 7 bankruptcy is entitled to return of any post-petition wages not yet distributed by the Chapter 13 trustee.
